description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Visitors' Companion at our Nation's Capital. A complete Guide for Washington, and its environs. With ... illustrations ... Edited by the Publisher. (G. G. Evans.)" Author: EVANS, George Greenlief. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10410.dd.12." Page: 88 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1892 Publisher: G. G. Evans Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001177406 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
